text: Dana Reeve (n√©e Morosini; March 17, 1961 - March 6, 2006) was an American actress who starred in many television programs and movies. She was born in Teaneck, New Jersey. She was featured in the television soap opera All My Children. She was the widow of Christopher Reeve. Reeve died of lung cancer in March 2006 in New York City. ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:1961 births Category:2006 deaths Category:People from Teaneck, New Jersey
title: Dana Reeve
